lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: of a gift from my sister Patty.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a govt agency, helping to manage water supplies in the western U.S.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I saw it on the news, and thought it was an awesome idea. Fortunately I can afford to loan a little of my money to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I assist the geologist in locating hydrocarbon zones on oil and gas wells in Texas. In my free time I like the guitar, chess, and pocket billiards.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I loan mostly to Viet Nam, Cambobia, and Laos. I served in Viet Nam for 18 months, and I feel an obligation to help out.

lender.name: Donna & AJ
lender.loan_because: This is a great program. I am more than happy to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank. I am the person who helps the bank's employees utilize their benefits and get training. I also ensure the bank follows legal employment practices.

lender.name: kerry
lender.loan_because: I believe that part of our lifework is to reach out to others and help them along in whatever way we can.

lender.name: Cassie & Nikki
lender.loan_because: We are in First Grade. We are learning we can have an impact upon the world we live in. One important way is contributing to those that need just a little help. It *is* possible to change the world and we want to be part of it...
lender.occupational_info: Living, learning, and growing up to be responsible, caring, giving global citizens...

lender.name: Charlie and Sheila
lender.loan_because: We live in abundance; it is a privilege to be able to share that abundance meaningfully.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to have had many opportunities. I wish others to have opportunity as well.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an electric utility.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I live in the land of opportunity compared to the people on this website, who live in poverty and have no other means of improving their quality of life. With assistance from the government in USA, I have earned a college degree in Diesel Truck Repair and wish to provide monetary assistance to disadvantaged people through global diversity. Social responsibility is the point I am trying to make, I just wish more people would take notice and try to make a difference in this competitive world. I saw this website on a news station, and want to get involved with my assistance toward unfortunate families.
lender.occupational_info: My job at this time is fulfilling my education as a college student, learning business and finance in addition to my mechanical trade will allow a much better opportunity in the near future. Recently, I started a soap business that is growing beyond my expectations. A portion of my products are donated to shelters to benefit battered women and the homeless.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I want to help others find the kind of success I have found in my life.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.occupation: Factory representative at Jasper Engines and Trans
lender.loan_because: I like the thought that I can help someone I have never met.

lender.name: Dr. Joe & Abigail
lender.loan_because: We want to set a good example for our 2 sons and expose them to generosity , who knows maybe this will catch on and undermine the Greedy "Money Masters" Evil Banking Empire. We know The banking system,Government and Religion has caused death and suffering to humanity since day one, while they enrich themselves at the cost of human life. People can eliminate poverty and suffering in the world by helping each other directly . A little kindness goes a long way. Our technology has surpassed our humanity, this must change kiva gives me hope and confidence for the future..
lender.occupational_info: My family has been involved in Healthcare for over 100 years. Helping people live healthy productive lives. its all about mutual dignity.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I loan becasue it is so easy and takes so little to make a difference in someone's life. How can I not do this?
lender.occupational_info: I currently work for a computer software company and am responsible for generating business for that company as well as public relations and product development strategies.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: It's one good way to help people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital on the night shift.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for all and have always dreamed of being a philanthropist. Making loans through Kiva is also my small way of honoring my friends and family who have helped my own photography business grow through micro-loans and small investments.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer who takes pictures of food, scenic travel destinations, and everyday life. One of my specialties is taking pictures of blind and disabled people in honest situations. My photographs are published in magazines, newspapers, websites, books and advertisements.

lender.name: Terry & Victoria
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is such an easy way to make a positive difference and the link is so personal.
lender.occupational_info: Terry, a CPA, took an early retirement from the US Postal Service to pursue a long time dream in finance. Victoria continues homeschooling the last of our seven children while pursuing a degree in Family & Children's ministries.

lender.name: BOTW
lender.loan_because: I believe in creating sustainable prosperity throughout the world, and that through microfinance, the redistribution of power from the few to the many becomes an inevitability.
lender.occupational_info: I own a website dedicated to uplifting humanity by way of the Humanities called "Buys of the World". We are a community of creative consumers dedicated to using the resources within our community to express the spirit and uplift man and woman kind

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Proverbial rocket scientist.

lender.name: Josephine
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have equal opportunities to get ahead in life.

lender.name: Andrew & Rachel
lender.occupational_info: Andrew is a graduate student studying how rivers interact with the landscape. Rachel teaches music.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: Received a Kiva gift certificate, and discovered a great lending program.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: because i can make the same money work over and over again.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: I trust and I hope these loans will enable others to realize their dreams. I have just recently heard of this wonderful organization on CNN. I thought to myself....what a brilliant stroke of genius! And who said one person could not make a difference?!
lender.occupational_info: I load new Toyota vehicles on to rail cars. from there they are transported all over the world. My work requires no small amount of attention to detail. As my work is conducted out of doors, and doing this in Canada, scarcely necessary to mention the weather seldom makes this an easy task.

lender.name: Christine
lender.occupation: graduate student, Hebrew Bible and Ancient Israel
lender.loan_because: Although I am a PhD student and living on government loans, fellowships and other financial aid, I am deeply aware of how lucky I am to live this life, especially in terms of the way most women live on this planet and the experience of the women in my family just two generations ago. It brings me so much joy to contribute to other women gaining the independence and opportunities we all deserve.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student at Harvard University, studying the Hebrew Bible and the history of ancient Israel. I study Hebrew inscriptions from the biblical period and other ancient languages related to Hebrew. I work on archaeological excavations in the summer and during the school year I teach other graduate students and work on preserving Akkadian and Sumerian cuneiform tablets in the museum.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I write procedures to help pilots fly

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: mary
lender.loan_because: I WANT PEOPLE TO KNOW THAT THERE IS SOME IN THIS WORLD THAT WOULD LIKE TO SEE PEOPLE BE HAPPY
lender.occupational_info: I AM A MISSIONARY

lender.name: Francisco
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have the opportunity to do it. I hope this money really helps those it goes to.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise the repair of aviation instruments. I have fun at work and always like to work with people from other nationalities. I am also a volunteer youth futbol coach for girls, I love doing that even more.

lender.name: Abiodun
lender.loan_because: I want people to invest in my business too. I need money for business development. $5000-$10000 to be repaid on agreed terms and duration.
lender.occupational_info: I am into supply and installation of Ceilings and Waterproofing materials for construction projects in Nigeria.

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other people's lives.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepenuer and want to give back
lender.occupational_info: Lead a business that manufactures mobile workstations for hospitals

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: This gives me an opportunity to share some of my good fortune with those in need, and to promote the aspirations of others with vision and hope for a better future.
lender.occupational_info: Direct medical care to patients.

lender.name: Deion
lender.loan_because: To make the world a better place :)

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe what I do and how I live my life affects many many people in far away places I will never see or know; and I want to be careful to make my impact as positive as possible. God has blessed our family in many ways and made us the stewards of resources beyond our basic needs. We desire to share what we have and believe that none of us can truly prosper in a world where poverty and hunger exists.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician. I primarily work in family practice with uninsured people requiring healthcare in the US and also serve a rural population. I have a wonderful husband and I homeschool my three children. I also teach classes in healthcare, nutrition and gardening promoting self-sufficiency. We run a small store with organic food and natural products.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I have the ability and resources to share with others and feel I should do my part to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Becky and Grandpa
lender.loan_because: Grandpa and I thought it was a really great idea!

lender.name: Norm and Family
lender.loan_because: I wish to see others succeed in life and to keep families strong. It is my way to "pay forward".

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: This system helps individuals raise themselves up.

lender.name: Dani and Grandpa
lender.loan_because: Grandpa and I thought it was a remarkable way to help others.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: it makes sense
lender.occupational_info: I work with high school students in an international school desiring to enter college or university.

lender.name: Jen WG & family
lender.loan_because: I have enough money to share. We are not at all rich by U.S. standards, but it's important to me to foster economic independence where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in family planning in low income areas of San Diego, California. I help by giving people information that will allow them choose how many children they wish to have and when they wish to have them.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women have a chance to make a living for themselves.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Knowing that a relatively small amount from my perspective can make such a difference to someone else makes it an easy choice. I'm not in a position to travel and volunteer right now, so this seems like the least I can do to help improve peoples' lives.
lender.occupational_info: I talk with people online about the products and services they wish certain companies provided, and work with those companies to help them understand their customers' needs.

lender.name: Kyle & Tara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at a better life.
lender.occupational_info: He makes computers do what they do. She gives children the gift of education.

lender.name: Stephen S.
lender.occupation: Supply chain management _ DuPont Wilm, De.
lender.loan_because: I like the proverb give someone a fish you feed them for a day, teach them to fish you feed them for a lifetime. I see Kiva teaching people to fish.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the supply chain group for a industrial specialty film whose major application today is in the photovoltaic ( solar cells that make electricity ) market.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs get started so they can support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Software business.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: it's helping people help themselves

lender.name: Tim and Angie
lender.loan_because: We believe micro-lending is an effective way to fight poverty and empower people.
lender.occupational_info: Tim is a project manager for a large corporation. My team creates complex software solutions for engineering and manufacturing of large aircraft. Angie is a pediatric speech pathologist who lovingly helps babies born with cleft palates and other swallowing issues. She also helps children with a variety of speech and language issues.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: I want to know that I have tried to make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because:
It is the right thing to do!!!
Do or do not their is no try.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given a chance to make their life better.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: it's the best way to spend 25 bucks that I can think of
lender.occupational_info: I'm a middle school English teacher in Romania.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people less fortunate then myself, and invest my money in diverse markets is a good hedge against economic instability.
lender.occupational_info: Currently a student at Colorado State University. I work and study all the time...

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: that's how I roll

lender.name: Campero Family
lender.loan_because:
When you are born, you are crying and the rest of the people around you are smiling..
We try to live our lives in a way that when we are going to be about to leave it, we smile and the rest of the people around us cry.
lender.occupational_info: We sell small computers and bar code readers, used to collect data from different types of businesses.

lender.name: fernando
lender.loan_because: I'm very passionate about helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the Front desk of a Resort. I also own a shopping website.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give something to someone less fortunate.

lender.name: Toniann
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world -- one woman at a time, one family at a time.

lender.name: Kasha
lender.loan_because: I can and someone can benefit greatly from it.
lender.occupational_info: I study all the time.

lender.name: iriam
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Matthew and Abby
lender.loan_because: We want to help people with their endeavors.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I make (and occasionally drink) coffee! I work in a coffee shop and we also serve food. I also work part time as a baker in the same shop

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: My mom introduced me to this website. I am so grateful for everything in my life. Its great to be able to help other people.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: i want to make the world a better place :)

lender.name: Peter & Sandy
lender.loan_because: We want to help hard working people succeed.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I feel micro lending is the most effective tool to get funds to the individual with the most need. Loaning is much better than giving, as it teaches fiscal responsibility and a business sense. I lend to women with families, because I believe if you can lift the women out of poverty, she in turn will lift the family out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Environmental Manager for a Global Energy company. I have traveled to many developing and third world countries. I can see the need for funding, and want to support it by my personal actions and commitment.

lender.name: Ayron & Anna
lender.loan_because: This idea is simple genius.

lender.name: Stew & Dana
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people develop the skills to support themselves. We would also like to contribute to creating a better balance of wealth around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: Dana develops products for various retailers. Stew is a communications consultant, creating internal communications programs for large companies.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help other people be the best they can be. If 25$ is keeping them from that, then I will gladly give that up. I love helping people and hope that I can make a meaningful difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in Austin, Texas studying Government.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: ... it's a fantastic way to enable people to build something they can be proud of, something that will improve their lives, and maybe even their outlook on life. And they can do this with dignity and pride that comes with accomplishments and hard work. In the end what really matters is not what you say you will do, but rather what you actually do -- and that applies to all of us.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: "The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the world's problem." - Gandhi

lender.name: Martina
lender.loan_because: it's right.
lender.occupational_info: I do business consulting, mainly for the internet industry.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I was the son of a poor family. After 35 years of work I have stopped to see where I came from and where I am now. It is time to repay and pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I was a police officer and received injuries in 1981 that have now diabled me and I am unable to continue working.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: It's rewarding to enable others to improve their lives and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I design networking and technology solutions for businesses.

lender.name: Mehitabel
lender.loan_because: I feel guilty for having so much when others have so little.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: Developing countries requires developing markets.
lender.occupational_info: I sell people clothes.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: we need to take care of each other, if no one else will.
lender.occupational_info: knowledge is power so i try and deliver power to people.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to reach women struggling to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a widow. I care for my 95 year-old Mother at home. Many years ago, I needed money and someone to believe in me. A wise and generous woman came into my life and helped me with a loan. When I paid her back, she asked me to repay her kindness by helping others in need. That is why I am delighted to be involved in the KIVA project. Her generous spirit goes on with every loan I make.

lender.name: Janelle
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Mother

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: I sell used clothes and other things

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in this life to have enough to share. I also want to set an example for my child. If I want her to share, then I should also share.
lender.occupational_info: I type notes for doctors about sick people in the hospital.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to be successful and to help make an impact in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I help large corporate organizations solve their complex business problems.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: I support people who are trying to use capitalism to help their fellow human beings. They can use this money much better than I can.
lender.occupational_info: When not learning in school, I work by sitting in a room filled with tens of thousands of dollars worth of technology in it and trying to make sure that nobody breaks anything.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: Why not help someone who's trying to work and make a living for themselves?
lender.occupational_info: I am a Logistician!

lender.name: For Mom
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people succeed.

lender.name: Long
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to be in the situation I am in now, having the opportunity to give something back, I want to help out the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Student, interested in technology

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: I work in a clinic where we provide speech and language therapy to children who have difficulty speaking, reading, or understanding spoken words.

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: I care about everyone and want to help people and show them that I beleive in them and that someone cares and is rooting for their happiness and success.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, I go to college and then I look for jobs!

lender.name: Jim&Conchita Burmeister
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with opportunity, now it's time to share that blessing with others.
lender.occupational_info: Helping Landlords and property managers with their tenant problems.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I love the idea behind KIVA and would like to lend what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small business (just me and two other estheticians), specializing in a holistic approach to skin care using botanical-based products.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: it's not charity
lender.occupational_info: I spend my time reading books and learning about how books work.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help others and I am a firm believer in supporting people who are trying to better themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer and administrator with the local courts.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Helping others achieve their goal, offsets the risk of default. Traditional banking practices often overlook these start-up operations or structure loans with unrealistic interest rates.
lender.occupational_info: I'm self-employed, work abroad in mainly less developed or Countries in turmoil.

lender.name: Mankel
lender.loan_because: I have visited a lot of different countries in Latin America and the Caribbean and I know how powerful small amounts of money can be there. I don't believe in microcredits from big financial Institutions with high interest rates, neither in the development policies of the last fifty years. I think with Kiva I can really help out people without consolidating existing dependency structures between poor and rich countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working on my doctoral thesis in Germany

lender.name: The Three Treasures Zen Center
lender.loan_because: Changing this world one action at a time creates so many positive actions that we feel anyone can change this world if we function correctly in it. How can I help YOU!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a Buddhist Zen Center in rural upstate New York,

lender.name: Karolyn
lender.loan_because: I want to support the growth of businesses in different parts of the world. I'm fairly new to this and am excited that this organization exists.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage families' investments so that they save for retirement and help sustain their lifestyles. Everyone deserves to live a plentiful life by saving and learning about the management of their assets.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I think that this is the right thing to do. I believe strongly in education and I have benefited tremendously from education. I would never have achieved my education were it not for a variety of student loans; people willing to invest in my future. This is one small way in which I can help someone's educational and/or small business dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am educated and trained as a scientist, specifically a chemist. I currently lead a team doing research and development of new chemical processes for the semiconductor industry.

lender.name: jose
lender.loan_because: for me is nothing, for them is everything
lender.occupational_info: I work for Telefonica in Spain. I am specialized in marketing for the youth segment. I am also a part-time professor of business administration, at Universidad Complutense de Madrid

lender.name: wesley
lender.loan_because: because i want to make a difference ...
lender.occupational_info: I manage a collision repair center that repairs vehicles when they are in a crash

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea, that we as individuals can change the world for the better; one person at a time. That even the smallest action, can have the greatest reaction when it comes to helping others in need. Kiva.Org shows how anyone, anywhere, can help somebody, somewhere in the world make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hotel and help my guests to have positive experiences during their stay. I provide them with information about my hotel and my city.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Firefighter / Artist / Musician

lender.name: Rosario
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are put on this earth to help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother, wife, executive office manager and I somehow juggle it all.

lender.name: Marieke
lender.loan_because: It's a nice way to help out people at the other side of the world.

lender.name: ebrima malamin
lender.loan_because: every little positive contribution towards helping someone in need can have great positive impact in our world.
lender.occupational_info: my work is dedicated to helping all people get and feel better than the day before.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Although my life is not perfect, and I am by no means a wealthy person, I am a lucky person that wants to help those that need it.
lender.occupational_info: I design, install and maintain computer networks.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I'm just trying to make this world a better place.

lender.name: Gerald & Lisa
lender.loan_because:
because GOD tell us to help our brothers and sisters.
Porque Dios los dise que alludemos a nustros Hermanos e Hermanas

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Because some people are in need, and my Uncle Mike started this as a present for me.
lender.occupational_info: Go to school, travel around, play soccer, and be a kid.

lender.name: I Care
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to try and grow a business on your own; especially when you don't have substantial credit history, or people to believe in you. I believe in you...I care.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small clothing business, but I'm looking into becoming an airline pilot instead.

lender.name: Joao
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a computer programmer.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: together with small amounts we can make a huge contribution in all corners of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people quickly release any negative emotions that they are feeling.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe the capitalist system is the best for the individual and his/her country. I would like for all to understand and succeed.

lender.name: Al A.
lender.loan_because: I've traveled to different places in the world and witnessed the need to help others lift themselves up from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help by making peace and safety possible so that good people can live in harmony and prosperity

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: It's a cool way to become involved in helping people directly.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 10 and 11 year-old kids in the 5th grade in a public school.

lender.name: Carroll
lender.loan_because: I want to share my love and concern with others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach piano to all ages and all levels.

lender.name: Benton
lender.loan_because: it is burning desire of mine to 'give away much that has been so wonderfully given to me' ... The older I have gotten, the more I see the needs of others and I am thankful to my God for that realization.
lender.occupational_info: I offer insurance plans to others that they can purchase that will enable them to save their belongings or their lives or maintain good health through medical insurance.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I enjoy supporting such a great idea as micro-lending because it's a smart way to help people help themself.
lender.occupational_info: I am editing news for the german speaking customers of an international news agency.

lender.name: M.Jason
lender.loan_because: sometimes people just need a leg up to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I operated a yacht sales company for both new and pre owned yachts in MA before I came to Thailand.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: It's one small way I can contribute to a very worthwhile cause - giving others a chance

lender.name: Tor M.
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way for me to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and maintain different aircrafts.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineering student at Penn State University

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I believe in the dreams of humanity...

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I know what a joy it is to be self-employed. I love being able to help other people become independent with their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own consignment furniture business. I sell furniture and decorative accessories for other people. They get a percentage when their item sells. In 20 years the business has grown to two locations with 15 employees.

lender.name: Guy and Ellen
lender.loan_because: We want to leverage our good fortune.

lender.name: Horace@Steven
lender.loan_because: I care..

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I have lived overseas and want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn how to better market themselves and their businesses

lender.name: Rachel Brooks
lender.loan_because: It's fun!

lender.name: Dane
lender.loan_because: Giving to those in need is what America is all about.
lender.occupational_info: I fly all over the world. My job is too complicated for a short message.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Vivien
lender.loan_because: to help another is to grow and spread the spirit of love.
lender.occupational_info: I am a part-time caregiver to our three grandkids and a friend to the less fortunate, and would like very much to see such a project like Kiva develop in my own country.

lender.name: Tony & Melissa
lender.loan_because: We have been so lucky in our lives, and we want to share that good fortune with other people.
lender.occupational_info: Tony works with people whose minds are troubled. Melissa takes photos of people celebrating important times in their lives

lender.name: shea
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping other people
lender.occupational_info: I am an 8th grade student that makes and sells jewelry. This is an opportunity for me to help someone else with their small business

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to improve the lives of others and to do my small part in making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. When people at my job have problems with their computer they call me.

lender.name: Alonzo
lender.loan_because: It helps people that want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Just being a kid. (fishing & skateboarding)

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We can!

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: We all share a responsibilty to make this world a little better.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I live in the beautiful New England state of Massachusetts in the United States of American.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I think it is the most responsible way to help people. Rather than a handout, people get a hand, work hard, prove their work ethic and make their business flourish!
lender.occupational_info: I am an Electrical Engineer.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I think the program is an excellent way to help out a bit
lender.occupational_info: I help schools get better

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: There are people in the world less fortunate. Everyone needs to be beleived in. Small dreams are made HUGE by the right people.

lender.name: Faye
lender.loan_because: It was a Xmas gift. I hope to continue the process monthly on my own.

lender.name: THERESA
lender.loan_because: I would like to believe we all still have empathy toward others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in the hospital when they are sick.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: Willing to help build peoples dream for a better life.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It's a first step.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teachers. I help new teachers learn to think about, and make a difference in, the world beyond the classroom.

lender.name: Zo
lender.occupational_info: I am 15 years old and I am a student.

lender.name: Howells Family
lender.loan_because: lending a hand to help is the least we can all do....

lender.name: Matthew Katawicz
lender.loan_because: many other people are not as fortunate as I am and I feel good that I can make the world a better place one small step at a time.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance. Chaque personne mrite une chance.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I want to promote social progress and better standards of life.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I found myself with extra cash each month after paying off some debt. I wanted to put it to good use!

lender.name: MidlandHighChemics(Mr.M)
lender.loan_because: To spark an entrepreneurial spirit throughout the world by applying Chemic Pride.
lender.occupational_info: Funded by students in Mr. Mulvaney's economics/world studies classes.

lender.name: Opus Lives
lender.loan_because: i fell that i have so much in my life that i feel like its my responsibility to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to give and I want to experience how amazing this site is.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. Like anywhere in the world, I teach students to read, write, think, and care.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help the mis-fortunate to achieve the dream of owning their business.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Let's make something great happen!

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I really love the idea behind this site.

lender.name: Matt, Angie and Hallie
lender.loan_because: I feel that it's important to help those around us in whatever small way we can.
lender.occupational_info: I design electronic systems for the aerospace industry.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I believe that every person in this world should have the same opportunities for happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I study...a lot.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: In this day and age it is rewarding to see people trying to make a better life for themselves and their families. If each person in this world would give someone a hand up and not a hand out - what a wonderful place this would be!

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: we have a responsibility to give back to those with fewer resources.

lender.name: Jen Heeg
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I teach politics at Texas A&M's campus in Doha, Qatar. My favorite classes to teach are "Politics of Global Inequality" and "World Politics."

lender.name: Suzana
lender.loan_because: I have travelled to many places in the world. I have seen a genuine kindness and selflessness in people who are in need and willing to do something to change that. This is a great idea to promote financial independence. Kiva works. I hope they expand the program to the U.S.

lender.name: Alpha-Zeus
lender.loan_because: Potential is lost without opportunity.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.occupational_info: I help provide intensive residential treatment to troubled youth who cannot be maintained in group homes or foster care.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: this is the best idea I have seen in years
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: a little money can do so much!
lender.occupational_info: I help photographers build their businesses by designing brochures and flyers that advertise their services.

lender.name: Betsey
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor who helps women who have breast problems, especially breast cancer. I live in a part of the US where there are many women with breast cancer but, fortunately, most are able to survive and lead normal lives due to good medical care. I am also interested in breast cancer care in other parts of the world, particularly in developing countries.

lender.name: Israel
lender.loan_because: My family believes in the great opportunities that microcredit provides to people around the world! Go Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the "Paying Forward" theory. I was given a helping hand, not by an individual but by timing and circumstance. Any "help up" should be repaid when the opportunity presents itself. KIVA is my opportunity to repay.

lender.name: Alexander Lamm
lender.loan_because: I love helping other businesses acquire the necessary funds to expand or get their business started. I feel it is important to share the world's resources equally and help each other wherever possible. Thank you Kiva for making this possible!
lender.occupational_info: I am the owner of Unlimited Mind which offers Brainwave Optimization to help clients balance their brains. Brainwave Optimization balances brain activity from the lobes of one side of the brain to the other, and from the front of the brain to the back. The sole objective of brainwave optimization is to establish balance and harmony in the brain. Harmony refers to the way energy patterns function together from low to high in the various regions of the brain.

lender.name: Brendan Campbell
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at success.

lender.name: Malcolm
lender.occupational_info: I help small software companies market their products and grow their business.

lender.name: Michael & Dara
lender.loan_because: Hopefully we can help people realize their dreams and better provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in travel and tourism by marketing my city as a place to visit for vacation and business. Dara is an attorney who helps people plan for their families and businesses.

lender.name: The team at Ad4Good
lender.loan_because: Every man worldwide should be rewarded for his hard work, irrespective of his country of origin. Thanks to the internet, we can finally free up capital from the West, stimulate entrepreneurship and help eradicate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Ad4Good is a London-based advertising agency that makes basic products such as bottles of water free to the public by placing ads on their packaging.

lender.name: kristl VC 1981
lender.loan_because: I believe that there is prosperity enough for all, if we all share what we can to assist others when they need it.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I'm very blessed. Blessings should be shared.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I believe that if people in poverty are given a chance, a hand up, a microcredit loan, they will change their circumstances, their family, their community and their country for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I want to help Muhammad Yunis build his "Museum of Poverty" so when there is none, we can appreciate what it once was!

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: Caprice & Jasmine
lender.loan_because: What else would we spend our money on, more shoes?
lender.occupational_info: Caprice is a makeup artist for TV & magazines. Jasmine is a student and artist.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: I believe that people should always be given a chance to better their lives

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because:
"The world is a dangerous place, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who look on and do nothing."- Albert Einstein
'real estate doesn't interest me. It's no doubt a great flaw in my personality, but I can't think in terms of boundaries. Those imaginary lines are as unreal to me as elves and pixies. I can't believe that they mark the end or the beginning of anything of real concern to the human soul. Virtues and vices, pleasures and pains cross boundaries at will.'-Kurt Vonnegut
KIVA, like the Grameen Bank before it, is a perfect example of what it will take to change the world... we can't rely on corrupt governments or the UN,... we can only rely on each other, as fellow humans, as brothers and sisters of this human race.
lender.occupational_info: the only difference between anyone, anywhere... is language. We bleed the same blood and breathe the same air. I am working towards building a world where religion and politics don't matter, a world without oppression, apartheid, war, genocide or anything else that grows out of greed, ignorance, fear and hate...

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I shop for the items needed to decorate our film sets. It's a fantastic, challenging experience everyday!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: hopefully acts of kindness are contagious. If you are reading this and are considering participation, lend now, help someone. Your power to change a life is immeasurable.

lender.name: Jim
lender.occupational_info: Interest rate risk management in banking.

lender.name: Kutibh
lender.loan_because:
I must be the change I want to see in the world.
If you give charity openly, it is good, but if you keep it secret and give to the needy in private, that is better for you, and it will atone for you some of your bad deeds. God is aware of all that you do. [The Qur'an 2:271]
lender.occupational_info: Currently a neuropharmacology major at UCLA

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: We have so much and it is only right to share. It is also a honor :)
lender.occupational_info: I care for people at a hospital. My primary focus is patients that are mentally ill and/ or mentally retarded. In other words special!

lender.name: Philip & Cathy
lender.loan_because: Traveled the world and know how lucky we are to live in the US. Loans help share some of that luck.

lender.name: Simply Me
lender.loan_because: "Never believe that a few caring people cannot change the world. For, indeed they are the only ones who ever have" Margaret Mead"
lender.occupational_info:
Love IS the only way!
Each Life Affects Another
We may not always realize That every thing we do, Affects not only our lives But touches others, too!
For a little bit of thoughtfulness That shows someone you care, Creates a ray of sunshine For both of you to share.
Yes, every time you offer Someone a helping hand ... Every time you show a friend You care and understand ...
Every time you have A kind and gentle word to give ... You help someone find beauty In this precious life we live.
For happiness brings happiness And loving ways bring love; And Giving is the treasure That contentment is made of.
~ Amanda Bradley ~

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: i like to watch goodness travel.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. I believe that everyone deserves an opportunity and Kiva.org is the best way to give people just that.
lender.occupational_info: I service low income families with life insurance. This helps them bury their deceased relatives without going bankrupt. I sell, service insurance to the roughest parts of town.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Trying to help make the world just a little better than when I got here.
lender.occupational_info: Interesting.

lender.name: Mike and Christina
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate and want to share with others. Kiva is a great idea and we want to be a part of it.

lender.name: elisabeth
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the difficulties of starting a business with little or no resourse. As was done for me, it's a pleasure to ease the hardships for someone else through a group effort.
lender.occupational_info: I drive tractor/trailers for a company that transports racehorses. I sought a Class A CDL as a better way to support myself with a limited education. Best wishes and prosperity to all.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It's great to give! I can think of many times in my life when a stranger did something for me so that I could move forward with my life. I am giving forward the blessing that was shared with me.
lender.occupational_info:
Born and bred on the rough streets of Bronx, NY, Chris Gloss began life as a potential statistic. The strong willed and charismatic son of a devoted single mother, Chris often found himself in challenging situations, as he discovered his natural ability to influence classmates and friends to follow his lead. Fortunately, by high school, he made a life-changing decision to use his leadership abilities to influence others, solely, for their good.
Further cultivation of Chris leadership abilities came as he defended his country in major conflicts, during his service in the United States Army. Maximizing on his talent for motivating others to greatness, Chris would go on to become highly successful in the sales arena, reaching top levels at numerous prestigious corporations, while simultaneously coaching fellow employees to improbable new heights.
An unrelenting passion for learning became the inspiration for a host of educational accomplishments at various respected institutions, including Mercer University, Central Texas College and Cameron University. That same passion would carry over into the world of personal development, resulting in mentorship by such industry greats as Zig Ziglar, Tom Hopkins and Les Brown.
Above and beyond impressive credentials, whether he is coaching sales teams or company execs, its unquestionably Chris inborn ability to arouse his audience with passion and conviction, to reach beyond self imposed limitations, that brands him the consummate motivator!
Having reached the seemingly impossible in his own life, Chris Gloss truly is the message that he brings.

lender.name: Gary & Sharon
lender.occupational_info: Counselling and Personal Development

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: In February of 2008, I lent to KIVA a total of $250.00 to be disbursed on a micro-loan basis to a selection of worldwide entrepeneurs. As little as $25 can be loaned to provide one less fortunate individual a hand up. As the loans are paid back, I am able to redeem the money or reloan to an entrepeneur of my choice. Since February 2008, my $250 has been invested and reinvested 51 times. This is a great opportunity to see your charitable donations clearly at work.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I can, I care, and it's exciting to know that you have helped someone.

lender.name: Crystal & Chris
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people - starting in our community but also elsewhere.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: it is a way to help others make a living and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: teaching deaf and hard of hearing students

lender.name: Yumiko & Tom
lender.loan_because: We are excited to help bring opportunity, encouragement and support to the creative individuals seeking to better their lives. We feel fortunate that in some small way, we can help individuals reach for and fulfil their dreams.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I'm not rich, but I'm fortunate. I started with just $100, and re-loan it as soon as my credit gets above $25. I've made over 20 loans and counting, and I don't ever miss that $100. Best investment I've ever made.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: To help others be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with severe head injuries to recover as much independence as possible.

lender.name: taylor
lender.loan_because: i'm trying to be a better person.
lender.occupational_info: i make pictures move.

lender.name: kjk
lender.loan_because: of something I once heard -- "Give more than you take."
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying mechanical engineering at the University of California - Santa Barbara.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Because this is new adventures in serious fun.
lender.occupational_info: Just love to design new and innovative automotive technologies!

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: If you are given it, share it...
lender.occupational_info: I am a Course Design Director for online learning at my university. I teach art online. My family is my world.

lender.name: Libra Lender
lender.loan_because: It helps me to "balance" what the U.S. has become lately. I've always been interested in microlending to women (enable them to fish!) and you've made it easy to stop procrastinating and do something about the need out there.
